title: Mindfulness Meditation
description: Well-Being and Health Promotion offers daily guided mindfulness meditation to help you start or build on your meditation practice!
cleaned_text: Mindfulness Meditation Meditation is a practice of concentrated focus on a sound, object, visualization, the breath, movement, or attention itself in order to increase awareness of the present moment, promote relaxation, and enhance person and spiritual growth. Research on mindfulness continues to evolve and a look at the state of science from [Greater Good at Berkeley](https://greatergood.berkeley.edu/article/item/the_state_of_mindfulness_science) shows: - Meditation almost certainly sharpens your attention. - Long-term, consistent meditation seems to increase resiliency to stress. - Meditation appears to increase compassion and make our compassion more effective. Guided Meditation Schedule Well-Being and Health Promotion will be offering weekly meditations for CUIMC students in-person and through Zoom. To receive communications about mindfulness meditation throughout the semester, take a moment to join our [Mindfulness Meditation mailing list](https://cumc.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_6AolVxn3j7zXRfo). You may [unsubscribe](https://cumc.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_6AolVxn3j7zXRfo) from the mailing list at any time.
